definitions.definition: The process of changing the state of a substance from liquid to gas by heating it to its boiling point .
The cooking (of food ) or cleaning (of an object ) by immersing it in liquid (usually water ) that is boiling .
A turmoil ; a disturbance like that of bubbling water .
An animation style with constantly changing wavy outlines , giving a shimmering or wobbling appearance.

main_definition: ( uncountable , countable ) The process of changing the state of a substance from liquid to gas by heating it to its boiling point .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , countable ) The cooking (of food ) or cleaning (of an object ) by immersing it in liquid (usually water ) that is boiling .
( countable , figurative ) A turmoil ; a disturbance like that of bubbling water .
( uncountable , figurative ) An animation style with constantly changing wavy outlines , giving a shimmering or wobbling appearance.
